verbs.description: [V: pfeffernuesse] [ARG1: cookies] a german holiday tradition these fragrant cookies pack a warm rush of spices in every bite also called peppernuts they go wonderfully with coffee or tea —joanne nelson east stroudsburg pennsylvania cook

pfeffernuesse cookies a german holiday tradition [ARG2: these fragrant cookies] [V: pack] [ARG1: a warm rush of spices] [ARGM-LOC: in every bite] also called peppernuts they go wonderfully with coffee or tea —joanne nelson east stroudsburg pennsylvania cook
